Desc.entry: Offers support and advice to Africans and other ethnic minority groups living in Sheffield and its surrounding areas. An independent community group committed to supporting local community causes. The group aims to build a strong and vibrant local community and make a real difference to the lives of local people in need. Gives advice and support to refugees and asylum seekers on how to access education facilities, the benefits and welfare system, immigration matters and much more.

Langs.entry: Czech, Kikongo, Lingala, Polish, Slovak, Swahili, Tshiluba

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon, Tues & Thurs, however ring first before visiting

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
